events.name: GCDC Chennai Kickoff and Google Cloud Introduction
events.description:
13th July 2018 update:
+ I am excited that Harsh Dattani (Google Community Manager, Developer Relations) joins the meetup. Let us make use opportunity to get more insight.

+ Hall name: Meadows hall

--
We are happy to kickoff official "Google Cloud Developer Community" chapter in Chennai. Lets together make community vibrant.

Agenda:
09:30 AM - 09:45 AM : Registration.
09:45 AM - 10:15 AM : Community kickoff.
10:15 AM - 11:00 AM : Google Cloud Introduction.
11:00 AM - 11:15 AM : Next meetup and Networking.
11:15 AM - 11:30 AM : High Tea and Sign off.

We have taken best effort to organise this meetup. We request you to take care of following points to avoid waste of foods and logistics.
Point:
- Accept invite or "Mark as going" when you have possibility to attend meetup.
- Change status to "Mark as not going" if any last minute change or contact organiser.
events.how_to_find_us: Near Little Mount Metro Railway Station

events.name: Next '18 Extended Chennai

venue.name: Zoho Corporation Pvt Ltd, Estancia IT Park,

events.description:
*Invite only* *Registration Require* *Bring laptop with Charger*

21-Aug-2018 - Updated agenda (Thanks to speaker)
--
19-Aug-2018 - Updated agenda (Thanks to speaker) and registration link.
--
13th Aug 2018 - Updated venue and Agenda. Please review and change the your available preference.

--

Hi All,
Registration require to attend the meetup. Guest need to Register individually. We will review and notify your attendees confirmation at the earliest.

Registration link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScgu4b45bZ4RpXdWsRMLVLRZLIdM2CmIqJiOQ4Cih-xwnZTHA/viewform

Join us for this year's Next Extended Event! We are excited to bring together the developer community to be a part of the Next '18 experience. This year, we have some exciting demo, codelab planned. Join this meetup to get official Google training, free of charge. Bring a laptop and get ready for best Next extended yet. #Next18Extended

Agenda:
01:00 PM - 01:30 PM : Welcome, Registration and introduction.
01:30 PM - 02:00 PM : Overview of GCDC and recap of Next18.
02:00 PM - 02:45 PM : End to End Application Development using Google App Engine by Vanishree.G.V
02:45 PM - 03:30 PM : Introduction to Tensorflow by Sri Harsha Gajavali.
03:30 PM - 03:45 PM : Break
03:45 PM - 04:00 PM : Sponsor talk.
04:00 PM - 05:00 PM : Intro to Certification with hands on, voucher, course.
05:00 PM - 05:30 PM : Feedback.
05:30 PM - 06:00 PM : Network, Sign off.

events.name: Machine Learning Study Jam Chennai

venue.name: Zoho Corporation Pvt Ltd, Estancia IT Park,

events.description:
**Bring your laptop!** If your Status shows as Going, means your registation confirmed **

21-Nov-2018 update: Recommended prerequisite.

--
New to Machine Learning but donâ€™t know where to start? Join us for a Machine Learning Study Jam by Google Cloud Developer Community Chennai ( #GcdcChennai ), where we will run through the Machine Learning Crash Course (MLCC)!

This course is intended for those who wish to learn about ML from a practical, applied perspective that will enable you to use machine learning in your everyday projects and learn about the power of TensorFlow. This is a great opportunity for anyone with basic technical knowledge and limited Machine Learning knowledge willing to gain some practical experience in ML and TensorFlow.

Facilitator: Sri Harsha
Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sriharshagajavalli

Registration step:
Step#1 Join waitlist at event page ==> https://www.meetup.com/Google-Cloud-Developer-Community-Chennai/events/255960213/

Step#2 Register through link with accurate information ==> https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeJoSlypayk3vcG0ckp1zixRwILDmE0X93r5idAVLVE4Gxcmg/viewform

Recommended prerequisite:
Install following packages and IDE before session.
1. TensorFlow
2. Scikit-learn
3. Numpy
4. Scipy
5. Matplotlib
6. PyCharm IDE

Topic covered:
- Introduction to ML
- Linear Regression
- Loss and its reduction
- Getting started with TensorFlow
- Training and Test data
- Feature crosses
- Classification Techniques
- Introduction to Neural Networks
- Training Neural Networks and multi-class neural networks

#GcdcChennai
#mlstudyjam
#IndiaMLCC

--

events.name: Cloud Study Jam Chennai : Kubernetes Introductory
events.description:
** Read details completely before register ** Bring your laptop! ** 2 step Registrations (mandatory)**

15-Feb-2019 - Registration closed

Greeting from Google Cloud Developer Community Chennai. We appreciate your cooperation for successful completion of event.

Please register if you 100% plan to come to meetup event, to effective utilise the event.
Registration step (all steps are mandatory):
Step#1 Join waitlist in this event page. ==> https://www.meetup.com/GcdcChennai/events/258692787
Step#2 Register through link with accurate information ==> http://bit.ly/GcdcChennaiRegistration

--

Want to get started Kubernetes on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for Cloud Study Jam! on Kubernetes introductory by Google Cloud Developer Community Chennai ( #GcdcChennai ) where we will run through fundamentals of building cloud native solutions using Kubernetes! We'll use Qwiklabs to take you through a firsthand experience.

The Cloud Study Jam will also grant you free access to Qwiklabs platform for 30 days so you can continue your learning. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Kubernetes. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.

Bring a laptop (Donâ€™t forget your charger)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Agenda:
09:00 AM to 10:00 AM : Event check-in and on spot registration.
10:00 AM to 10:10 AM : Welcome note.
10:10 AM to 10:30 AM : Get free access to Qwiklabs
10:30 AM to 11:00 AM : GCDC Chennai introduction and success story
11:00 AM : Event check-in closure.
11:00 AM to 11:30 AM : Container and Kubernetes basics
11:30 AM to 12:00 PM : Lunch
12:00 PM to 01:00 PM: Lab 1
01:00 PM to 01:15 PM : Sponsor talk
01:15 PM to 01:30 PM : Break
01:30 PM to 02:30 PM : Lab 2
02:30 PM to 03:30 PM : Lab 3/Quiz
03:30 PM to 03:45 PM : Specialisation, certification
03:45 PM to 4:00 PM : Thank note, feedback, Event closure

Lab:
- Introduction to Docker
- Node app on Kubernetes
- Slack Bot with Node.js on Kubernetes
- Package Manager

Venue sponsor: Genesys Telecom Labs
Venue location:
SP Infocity (or new name Global City), Block - C, 4th Floor,
No 40, MGR Salai, Kandanchavadi, Perungudi, Chennai[masked]

Search below code in Google Maps for Direction
Code: 7M42X6CV+4X

#GcdcChennai
#IndiaCloudStudyJams
#CloudStudyJam
#CloudStudyJam19

Note:
Photograph allowed inside venue only

--
Archive:
06-Feb-2019 : Meet-up event created

Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for "Cloud Study Jam Chennai : Cloud Architecture Certification" where we will run through fundamentals of Cloud Architecture Certification! We'll use Qwiklabs to take you through a firsthand experience.

The Cloud Study Jam will also grant you free access to Qwiklabs platform for 30 days so you can continue your learning. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs.

You will get hands-on experience. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.

Bring a laptop (Donâ€™t forget your charger)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Agenda:
09:00 AM to 10:00 AM : Event check-in and on spot registration.

group_profile.intro: I am passionate about open source, open learning and knowledge sharing. Reading is my habit and community engagement are my pastime. I am having 9+ years of operational IT analyst experience and 2+ years experience in Google Cloud Platform.
